name: black & white (itch) (jarvisjarvis)
description: a short lil rage game where your a lil ball or other character where you got to get down to the bottom. use boost pads to boost you in that direction and spinners that spin you around (note: you can not get inside the rotators if your holding Z) there is also a timer in the up left corner (P:S type your time in the comments, I'm curious, btw my best time 110). I probably will be adding new features and characters in the future.
